name.description: Name of the code. Possible values are: AccountingGroup, CostCenter, DistributionGroup. Also values that may be overlayed on the identification: AccountSubtype, AccountType. Also MICR numbers: MicrAccountNumber, The account number portion of a draft or line of credit MICR line. Other possible values: TaxIncentiveType, Preferredlanguage, FundsDelayedReason, DeliveryMethod.
